name: The Squire & The Jiggle Knight
description:
Save the village from the blobs by directing The Jiggle Knight.

Controls:
entirely mouse based, click the instructions to direct the knight
Once all the enemies are defeated, 'Return to the Tavern' for more quests.

Made in 72 hours for the Wowie Jam 3.0 (Failure Is Progress)
